import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function FaqForm() { let { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [faq, setFaq] = useState({ask:"", stitle:"", bodytext:"", subtitle:"", subbodytext:""}); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const handleType = (e)=>{ setError(null); const {name, value} = e.target; setNews((stateBefore)=>({...stateBefore, [name]:value,})); } return (
